! register out seems to not work with powershell -> using bat for now
! change to real url later! this still points to client 5002 hardcoded, can be changed as soon as we have public sharing(one url for all clients) :SET &AWI_URL# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PUB.SETTINGS","AWI_URL",1) :SET &SHARE_ID# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.VARA.GET_SHARED_DASHBOARDS",&DASHNAME#,2) :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_URL# = "&AWI_URL#/dashboard/&SHARE_ID#" !:SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_URL# = "&AWI_URL#/?system=AE10LLV&&client=5002&&name=SHARE&&department=PUBLIC&&autologin=true&&rdr=1#home/dashboards/&DASHNAME#" :PUB &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_URL#,,TOP ! Create filenames based on date and runid :SET &NOW# = SYS_TIMESTAMP_PHYSICAL() :SET &TARGET# = "&DASHNAME#_&NOW#_&$RUNID#" :SET &TARGET# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&TARGET#," ","_") :SET &TARGET# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&TARGET#,":","_") :SET &CAPTURE_DIRECTORY# = "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#\analytics\" :P &CAPTURE_DIRECTORY# @if not exist "&CAPTURE_DIRECTORY#" mkdir &CAPTURE_DIRECTORY# !Attach phantomjs and execute to create png and pdf version :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.STORE.PHANTOMJS", "*", C cd /d "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#" :IF &CREATE_PNG# = "Yes" : SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH# = "&CAPTURE_DIRECTORY#&TARGET#.png" echo "Start to capture PNG now" .\phantomjs.exe capture_dashboard.js "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_URL#" "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#" @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode echo "PNG successfully writen to: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#" : PUB &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#,,TOP : REGISTER_OUTPUTFILE "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#", "N" :ENDIF :IF &CREATE_PDF# = "Yes" : SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH# = "&CAPTURE_DIRECTORY#&TARGET#.pdf" echo "Start to capture PDF now" .\phantomjs.exe capture_dashboard.js "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_URL#" "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#" @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode echo "PDF successfully writen to: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#" : PUB &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#,,TOP : REGISTER_OUTPUTFILE "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#", "N" :ENDIF !publish run id :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_RUNNR# = SYS_ACT_ME_NR() :PUB &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_RUNNR#,,TOP :PUB &CAPTURE_DIRECTORY#,,TOP
